reviewText: There is a special edition of this film that you should get.  The last few minutes of this dvd keeps freezing after many attempts on different players.  This is an overseas dvd...be warned.

If you are a fan of The Mighty Boosh, you can't go wrong with this. I laughed throughout the DVD and enjoyed watching the extra features that were included. I loved the belt buckle and cards that came in this set. This is definitely something every Boosh fan needs.

While I cannot watch this on my TV since I live in a different county (Region), my laptop had no trouble playing this.
It's the Mighty Boosh. So what else do you want? It's cool because it's candid and some of the stuff Noel and Julian say is improvised. It's like just hanging out with the Boosh gang for an evening.
i love the mighty boosh. had to buy a region free dvd player to watch this but it is worth it !
Really like the Boosh.  Id like to see some of their early live shows on DVD before they were famous on TV.  Hope to see them back on the Boob Tube with a new series.
